about_the_game:
Step into the sandals of Titus, a valiant Roman soldier fueled by vengeance and honor. Traverse the treacherous landscapes of an unknown island in the Mediterranean Sea, where foggy mysteries swirl. Guided by the ghostly echoes of your past and the shadow of the empire you once served, embark on a haunting quest drenched in mysticism and darkness.

As you sail into the enigmatic archipelago, riddles of ancient myths, monstrous foes, and remnants of a forgotten era challenge your every move. Draw your blade, embrace your legacy, and confront the eerie entities that took away the one person you cherished the most.

Will your skills, honed over years of rigorous training, guide you to the truth? Or will the ethereal beasts consume your very soul? The storm of vengeance is upon you. The shadows of Rome await...

FEATURES:

  • A beautiful, hand-crafted overworld to explore
  • Side scrolling levels that will test your platforming and combat abilities
  • A town with people you can talk to who may help you on your quest
  • One challenging boss who stands in your way of further exploration

short_description: Dive into a retro Action RPG odyssey set in ancient Rome. As Titus, hunt spectral evils in a quest for revenge. Sail the haunted Mediterranean, face mythical monsters, and unravel mysteries from beyond the veil. A storm of vengeance brews; Rome's shadows beckon you forth.
